nodes.text: Lebrasa Argente School for the Arts and Persuasive Sciences
The Lebrasa Argente School for the Arts and Persuasive Sciences was an institution where poet laureate of Kooriva, Santos Bel-Pak, served as a professor emeritus.
The Lebrasa Argente School for the Arts and Persuasive Sciences was mentioned in the 2016 reference book Star Wars Propaganda: A History of Persuasive Art in the Galaxy, written by Pablo Hidalgo.
